content.1: My name is Techit Thawiang. I'm Thai, born in Thailand and living in Chonburi which is in Thailand. Software Development is what I'm interested in.
content.2: I can do designing as well, even though I'm not good at it. I'm interested to make small money out of both software development and designing but I'm too nervous. An advice is super welcome!
content.3: In my free time I mostly writing code, mostly this website lol. I've been coding since this website was called 'Techit's Home'

blog.description: A place for me to posts whatever I wanted to. Such as updating my life, reviewing stuff, posting something smart or just yap about my life. All will be here.

whoAmI.content: I'm a Grade 9 student at Kopho Tuay Ngam Wittaya School, planning to stay for the Science-Math program. I love development, making web interfaces, and exploring graphic design, making games, fonts, and more.
whoAmI.title: Who am I?

contact.description: I’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a project in mind, or just want to connect, feel free to reach out. Let’s start a conversation and explore how we can work together.
contact.title: Contact Me

blog.title: Latest Posts
blog.description: Check out my latest blog posts. This is where I post random stuff, tips and tricks, life update, pets and much more!

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: A collection of my skills and experiences across various technologies, curated as I continue to learn and expand my knowledge. :D

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: A showcase of my personal projects and creations, crafted using the skills and knowledge I've got through my experiences.
